com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2DepthOnlyBufferDescription.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2DepthOnlyBufferDescription.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    R2DepthOnlyBufferDescription

    public static final class R2DepthOnlyBufferDescription.Builder
extends Object
    Builds instances of type R2DepthOnlyBufferDescription. Initialize attributes and then invoke the build() method to create an immutable instance.

    Builder is not thread-safe and generally should not be stored in a field or collection, but instead used immediately to create instances.
